name: Starlight 1961
description:
Welcome, to Starlight 1961 !

In his speech in september 1962, JFK told

"Within these last 19 months at least 45 satellites have circled the earth"

You take place in the space ship named "Starlight 1961", that delivers things and stuff to some of these satellites. Will you be able to land and navigate in each one of them ?

Have fun !

This game has been made on a 4 colors pallet to fit with a retro gameboy style.
